'''''Creating The Lord of the Rings Symphony''''' is a [[2004]] documentary which includes excerpts of live concert footage, commentary by Howard Shore, and the illustrations of Alan Lee and John Howe.

This documentary can also be found on ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' Platinum series Special Extended Edition Collector's Gift Set.
